title: Integer Truncation Function
description:
D_TRUNC 
reviewes what result the IEC functions provides, and uses the appropriate 
function to deliver a useful result.
D_TRUNC(1.6) = 1
D_TRUNC(-1.6) = -1
name: D_TRUNC

input.name: X
input.description: The real number to be truncated to an integer.

return_value.description: The truncated integer value of the input real number.
